history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB06228
FULL TITLE : AN ACT MANDATING ALL BARANGAYS TO CREATE A REGISTRY OF SKILLED WORKERS
SHORT TITLE : Mandating All Barangays To Create A Registry Of Skilled Workers
ABSTRACT : Mandates all barangays to create and make public a registry that will serve as a database for all skilled workers who are willing to make their services available in the locality. Prohibits the barangay to collect fees for the inclusion of a skilled worker’s name and corresponding details in the registry. However, if the barangay decides to issue an ID pertaining to the skilled worker and the latter agrees to avail one, the barangay may collect a reasonable fee that would cover the cost of the production of the ID.
ALIAS NAME : “The Barangay Skilled Workers Registry Act.”
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ROMULO, ROMAN T., SAVELLANO, DEOGRACIAS VICTOR "DV" B., RIVERA, DOMINGO C., VILLANUEVA, EDUARDO "BRO.
